articles.title: How many hippos did Pablo Escobar have? - Quartz
articles.description: The government wants to ship the feral descendants of the Escobar zoo pets to India or Mexico
articles.content: The Colombian government wants to export about 60 invasive hippopotamuses that have escaped the former ranch of drug lord and cocaine exporter Pablo Escobar. Wildlife sanctuaries in India and Mexico … [+3311 chars]
